mapper.sql: ID, NAME, URL, ICON, SORT, PARENTID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, STATUS
mapper.select: select * from o_menu m,o_role_menu rm where m.id=rm.MENUID and rm.ROLEID=#{roleid}

mapper.update:
update o_menu
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update o_menu set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
